items.sentence: How long has it been since you\'ve slept in a comfortable bed?
Tom and Mary furnished their house with inexpensive furniture.
Tom and Mary aren\'t interested in buying a house with a pool.
Tom and Mary didn\'t do everything that John asked them to do.
Tom and Mary don\'t have the time or the money to take a trip.
I don\'t think there\'s any chance that Tom will believe that.
I don\'t think you\'re as good of a driver as you say you are.
Tom doesn\'t know the difference between a city and a village.
I got an email from Tom yesterday, but I haven\'t yet replied.
I googled you and found out that you\'ve spent time in prison.
Tom must\'ve studied French when he was a high school student.
Tom was surprised that Mary remembered what he\'d said to her.
There were three uniformed police officers at the crime scene.
Tom enlisted in the Marines after graduating from high school.
Tom said he knows how to play tennis, but he doesn\'t like to.
Tom told Mary he didn\'t like her scarf, so she got rid of it.
Are you still driving that car that your grandfather gave you?
It\'s probably a good thing that Tom wasn\'t at Mary\'s party.
How many people do you know that don\'t have health insurance?
Tom found Mary\'s constant criticism of him hard to cope with.
